about_the_game:
Longsword is a game of tabletop miniature combat. Assemble armies of miniature figurines, create the battlefield terrain of your dreams, and play turn-based tactical battles in solo campaigns, AI skirmishes, and online multiplayer! Unleash your creativity and share your creations with the world!

Features:
• Deep, Turn-based tabletop tactics made digital
• Solo skirmish and Campaign modes to learn the game, and Multiplayer modes to test your skills against the world
• Table Editor with Workshop integration to make your own tables and share them with the world
• More than 250 Champions, Spells, Structures, and Legendary equipment cards
• Hundreds of unique skills and conditions for incredible tactical depth
• Free Demo!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows (64bits only) 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: i3 4th generation / i5 2nd generation / A6 series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon 5800 series / NVidia 550Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 5th generation (or newer) / i5 3rd generation (or newer) / FX4170 (or newer)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 8000 series or newer / NVidia GTX 660 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Resolution: 1920 x 1080

short_description: Longsword is a game of hardcore turn-based tactical combat. Build decks of spells and miniatures to fight against humans or the AI in skirmishes and campaigns. Earn cards through play or just pay once for the whole set.
